item.description:
Jackie Rose, the founder of Top Performance, and the author of several books on public speaking will be our guest speaker!

Here is the abstract:

Speak Like a Pro and Your Business will Grow
5 Steps to Speaking with PEP – Power* Energy* Passion

Great presentations produce great results. Become a confident, dynamic, and engaging presenter! How you present determines how your message gets across and how your message gets across determines the results of your presentations. Learn how to get your desired results every time you speak and discover how to develop your public speaking skills and take them to a whole new level. If you are presenting about your business or services to prospective or current clients you need to have a great presentation if you want to grow your business and be more successful. Appear as the expert that you are. Learn how to create and deliver a great speech so that you can get great results from all of your presentations. Come prepared with a short opening to your next speech and receive on-the-spot coaching by public speaking skills expert, Jacki Rose.

Learn how to…

  • Grab your audience’s attention to get them interested immediately.
  • Take command of the room and present with total confidence.
  • Overcome your fear and nervous habits and appear professional.
  • Be creative and have fun with your presentations.
  • Effectively prepare your presentations and deliver them with impact.



It sounds like fun, and a great learning opportunity. Hope everybody can make it!
-arno
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the "Watertown Savings Bank" room
item.name: Speak Like a Pro and Your Business will Grow
